video.title: Egypt
video.synopsis: Using historical flashbacks and re-creations, this dramatic series tells the stories behind some of the great archaeological discoveries in Egypt.

episodes.synopsis: British archaeologist Howard Carter hunts for the tomb of Tutankhamun, fascinated by the tale of the boy who became king when he was just 9 years old.
episodes.title: The Search for Tutankhamun

episodes.synopsis: The prize that Howard Carter sought all his life yields more than anyone could imagine, including the sarcophagus of Tutankhamun himself.
episodes.title: The Curse of Tutankhamun

episodes.synopsis: An Italian circus performer describes how he became Egypt's greatest explorer; the 67-year reign of Egypt's most impressive pharaoh is explored.
episodes.title: The Pharaoh and the Showman

episodes.synopsis: Giovanni Belzoni clears centuries of sand from the buried temple at Abu Simbel, and his life-changing quest leads him to the tomb of a great pharaoh.
episodes.title: The Temple of the Sands

episodes.synopsis: Two brilliant men -- an English scientist and a young French linguist -- race to unlock the hidden language of the pharaohs.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Rosetta Stone

episodes.synopsis: Jean-François Champollion visits Egypt at last, hoping to become the first person in over a millennium to read the inscriptions on its temple walls.
episodes.title: The Secrets of the Hieroglyphs
